item.title: Interpreters Made Easy
item.description: The Interpreter pattern from the “Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object Oriented Software” can potentially be a very powerful pattern. It allows you to use a domain specific language to represent a complex computational situation. However, writing interpreters in practice can be tricky and time consuming. It really helps to know something about some fundamental parsing algorithms and techniques.
